metadata.title: org.eclipse.jetty:jetty-server: jetty: Jetty ThreadLimitHandler.getRemote() vulnerable to remote DoS attacks (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: There exists a security vulnerability in Jetty's ThreadLimitHandler.getRemote() which can be exploited by unauthorized users to cause remote denial-of-service (DoS) attack.  By repeatedly sending crafted requests, attackers can trigger OutofMemory errors and exhaust the server's memory.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 is installed
org.eclipse.jetty/jetty-server is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
